summary: This is an email chain from August 13-14, 2019, arranging a visit by SDNY prosecutors to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) to inspect the facility, including Epstein's cell, following his death. The emails discuss logistics, attendees, and the specific areas to be viewed, with a request that only MCC legal staff escort them due to ongoing investigations.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased inmate whose cell is to be inspected by visiting SDNY prosecutors; the cell is noted as still being cordoned off.

events.title: SDNY Prosecutors' MCC Inspection Visit
events.description: A scheduled visit by SDNY prosecutors to the Metropolitan Correctional Center to inspect the 2nd floor psych observation and suicide watch area, the 9th floor SHU, and Jeffrey Epstein's cordoned-off cell.

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: SDNY prosecutors scheduled a visit to the MCC for August 15, 2019, to inspect areas related to Jeffrey Epstein's death, including his cell.
The prosecutors specifically requested to see the 2nd floor psych observation/suicide watch area, the 9th floor SHU, and Epstein's cell, which was noted as still being cordoned off.
The visit was to be escorted only by MCC legal staff, with a directive not to speak to any guards present due to ongoing investigations.
The email chain indicates coordination between the SDNY and the Bureau of Prisons, including a request for the new acting warden to join the tour.
